statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents ORDER BY last_updated_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE compliance_status = false AND last_updated_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type, compliance_status FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM compliance_documents WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy' ORDER BY last_updated_date DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents WHERE last_updated_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY document_id ASC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_documents WHERE compliance_status = false AND document_type LIKE '%Report%';
SELECT document_name, last_updated_date FROM compliance_documents WHERE compliance_status = true AND document_type IN ('Policy', 'Procedure') ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceDocuments;
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE compliance_status='Pending';
SELECT doc_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceDocuments ORDER BY doc_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceLogs WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT doc_name, action_taken, activity_date FROM ComplianceDocuments JOIN ComplianceLogs ON ComplianceDocuments.doc_id = ComplianceLogs.doc_id WHERE compliance_status='Approved';
SELECT doc_id, doc_name, doc_type, compliance_status FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY doc_id DESC;
SELECT doc_name, compliance_status FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE doc_type = 'Policy' ORDER BY doc_name ASC;
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE doc_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE doc_name LIKE '%Policy%';
SELECT doc_name, activity_date FROM ComplianceDocuments JOIN ComplianceLogs ON ComplianceDocuments.doc_id = ComplianceLogs.doc_id WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_title, document_type FROM compliance_documents ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT document_title, document_owner FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_result = 'Failed' AND responsible_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_date, report_content FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT document_title, document_owner FROM compliance_documents WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT check_date, check_result FROM compliance_checks WHERE responsible_person = 'Alice' ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_owner = 'Bob' AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT document_title, document_owner, document_id FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_content IS NOT NULL AND length(document_title) > 10 ORDER BY document_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulations LIMIT 5
SELECT id, regulation_name FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_owner = 'Company ABC'
SELECT id, document_name, document_date FROM documents WHERE document_type='Policy'
SELECT id, audit_name, auditor FROM audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT document_name, document_date FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_audits FROM audits;
SELECT violation_name, violation_date FROM violations WHERE violation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY violation_date ASC;
SELECT r.regulation_name, a.audit_name, v.violation_name FROM regulations r, audits a, violations v WHERE r.id = 1 AND a.id = 1 AND v.id = 1;
SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT document_title, document_description FROM documentation ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_deadline FROM regulations WHERE compliance_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_title, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM documentation d INNER JOIN compliance_records cr ON d.id = cr.document_id WHERE cr.compliance_status = 'Not Compliant';
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.role FROM users u INNER JOIN audit_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id ORDER BY a.date DESC;
SELECT * FROM documentation;
SELECT document_title, document_description FROM documentation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_deadline FROM regulations ORDER BY compliance_deadline DESC;
SELECT document_title AS Title, document_description AS Description FROM documentation WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT users.username, audit_logs.action_performed, audit_logs.date FROM users INNER JOIN audit_logs ON users.id = audit_logs.user_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
